## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document.
To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

```{r}
library(sketchy)
library(vertical)
library(rcompendium)

rcompendium::new_compendium(
  compendium = ".",
  license = "MIT",
  status = "active",
  lifecycle = "experimental",
  vignette = FALSE,
  test = FALSE,
  create_repo = TRUE,
  private = TRUE,
  gh_check = TRUE,
  codecov = TRUE,
  website = FALSE,
  gh_render = TRUE,
  organisation = NULL,
  renv = FALSE,
  dockerfile = TRUE,
  overwrite = FALSE,
  quiet = FALSE
)
```
